note.title: Herakleopolis Magna must not fall
note.text: Defend the city of Herakleopolis Magna from the Roman legions.

note.title: Support priests
note.text: As longs as your priests remain next to the obelisks near the villages, peasants and food will be sent to Herakleopolis Magna.

note.title: Mercenary fort
note.text: If you bring either 10000 food or 5000 gold to the mercenary fort, you will gain a powerful group of war elephants.

note.title: Altar of the gods
note.text: The high priest has offered to help you against the Romans. To do so, you have to send 50 peasants to the altar of the gods.

note.title: Capture Memphis
note.text: Your enemies are tired and have stopped attacking from Memphis. It is time to go on the offensive and capture the city.

note.title: Capture Saqqara
note.text: If you capture Saqqara, the Roman legions will stop coming from the city, allowing you to prepare your army to attack Memphis safely.
